item.description:
• Do you have thoughts, emotions, reactions, or any fears that persist and have a hold on you? Feel like they just happen and are out of your control? 
  • Do you feel like sometimes “reality” is just too hard to talk your way around?
  • Do you find that you sometimes react to situations or circumstances in ways that cause stress or negative “drama”?
  • Are you stuck in limiting beliefs, unable to shift them?

Our experience of reality is created by the meaning and interpretations we give what is before us, and the subsequent stories we tell. This is what we react to and what determines how we respond and act moving forward, and also what we allow into our life, or not.


In this webinar, you’ll learn a simple five step process to:

  • easily catch yourself and prevent unnecessary internal and external dramas and stress
  • loosen your limiting beliefs
  • set you free to feel and create as you desire.

It only takes minutes, or less; and it all starts with one question that you’ll never want to forget.

To join the webinar follow these easy instructions. Relax, and read the instructions through first, and then you can let the process happen easily:

1. 5  minutes or so before the webinar is due to start, click on this link to sign in. You want to allow yourself time to get your audio set up.

https://www4.gotomeeting.com/join/748308039

2. Enter this meeting ID: 748-308-039

3. After GoToMeeting launches, choose how you're going to join the conference call - on the right side you will see the control panel.

NOTE: If GoToMeeting gets stuck - perhaps it needs a Java update. Search at the top of your browser and click 'Yes' to download, or update.

3. Select if you're going to dial into the conference with your telephone, or with your computer mic and speakers - a headset is recommended.

4. If you are dialing in with your telephone, a land line instead of a cell phone is always better. Call this number and then follow the instructions you hear:  1 (213) 493-0603

5. Enter this access code: 748-308-039

6. Have a pen and paper ready to fully participate in the exercise; and we hope you'll actively engage with us on the call to get the most out of it. We'll be ready to personally interact with you!

We expect the webinar to go to about 8:15 pm.

All are welcome! Feel free to invite others.

Can't wait!
Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: Call in details will be e-mailed to you after you RSVP - be sure to check your e-mail!

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Free Webinar: The ONE question that will set you FREE
